query: SELECT m.title as modulo, t.title as topico FROM learning_modules m JOIN learning_topics t ON t.moduleId = m.id WHERE m.subjectId = 870001 ORDER BY m.orderIndex, t.orderIndex LIMIT 25;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4EmYiUJsZhACerp.0e9436e27250 --database c6FhCpifoFzEQqXNtsKEU6 --execute SELECT m.title as modulo, t.title as topico FROM learning_modules m JOIN learning_topics t ON t.moduleId = m.id WHERE m.subjectId = 870001 ORDER BY m.orderIndex, t.orderIndex LIMIT 25;
